vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.33;
daughter of: Zelophehad (H6765);
sister of: Mahlah (H4244), Hoglah (H2295), Milcah (H4435H) and Tirzah (H8656)
§ Noah = "motion"
one of the 5 daughters of Zelophehad in the time of the exodus
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hija de Selofhad; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
挪阿 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "動作"
在出埃及時期西羅非哈的五個女兒之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
挪阿 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "动作"
在出埃及时期西罗非哈的五个女儿之一
